text: Ko onon yo gomɗimɓe, si on immanike julde, lootee geece mon ɗen e juuɗe mon ɗen haa ka coɓɓuli, maswon ko'e mon ɗen e koyɗe mon ɗen haa ka kolɓule. Si on laatike janabante, laɓɓintinee. Si on laatike nawnuɓe, maa e hoore laawol, maa ɓaawo hoggo arii gooto e mooɗon, maa on memondirii e rewɓe ɓen on heɓaali ndiyam, taamee e mbullaari laaɓundi : mashiron ndi geece mon e juuɗe mon. Alla Faandaaki nde O Waɗata e dow mooɗon ɓitteende, ko woni, Ko O Faandii, ko laɓɓingol on, e nde O Timminta Neema Makko on e dow mooɗon, belajo'o, on yettay [Mo]
